item.title: Pictomancer Skills Overview
item.description: Spells and Abilities Icon Action Name Level Type Cast/Recast MP Cost Range/Radius Description Fire in Red 1 Spell 1.5s / 2.5s 200 MP 25y / 0y Deals fire damage with a potency of 400.Additional Effect: Grants AetherhuesDuration: 30sThis action is affected by Hyperphantasia. Aero in Green 5 Spell 1.5s / 2.5s 200 MP 25y / 0y Deals wind damage with a potency of 440.Additional Effect: Grants Aetherhues IIDuration: 30sCan only be executed while under the effect of Aetherhues.
